trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器提供设计时支持<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当用户切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。

trans-unit.source: The HiddenFieldDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: HiddenFieldDesigner 类提供设计时支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>可视设计器中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法返回用于呈现关联的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>在设计时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner>类时创建关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控件或一份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>设计图面上的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联的控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the control class name and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: GetDesignTimeHtml 方法为包括控件类名称的占位符生成标记和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于呈现的标记的字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref>在设计时。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联的组件。

trans-unit.source: The designer calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
trans-unit.target: 准备设计器用于呈现时，设计器将调用 Initialize 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化和其基方法配置属性，并连接到所需的设计器操作的事件。

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
trans-unit.target: `component`参数是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>与此设计器或一份相关联的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>
